mapper.update: update hospital_member set director = #{director}, hospital = #{hospital}, h_tel = #{hTel}, h_reptel = #{hReptel}, h_address = #{hAddress}, h_choice = #{hChoice}, h_profile = #{hProfile}, open_time = #{openTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, close_time = #{closeTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_profile = #{dProfile}, h_Introduction = #{hIntroduction}, h_location = #{hLocation}, h_longitude = #{hLongitude}, educational = #{educational} where h_username = #{hUsername}
